comments.comment: Maybe <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ContinuumIO/anaconda-issues/issues/11294>this</denchmark-link> is relevant? It looks like they've since pulled the packages from the registry, so maybe you can just try to upgrade the package? Otherwise it looks like setting helped others.
Looks like a bullseye! Setting KMP_INIT_AT_FORK=FALSE helped me too. Gonna look into upgrading my Anaconda to see if that helps.
